long_description: With built-in liner shorts and feminine styling for your daily run, the Patagonia Strider Skort makes it easy to stick to your workout routine and feel confident doing it. Lightweight, quick-drying stretchy outer fabric breathes and moves well when you're running; fabric is 50% recycled. Fabric features a durable water repellent finish that causes light moisture to bead up and roll off. Built-in liner shorts breathe well, resist odors and won't chafe while you're running. Drop-in pocket at hip stashes a key, rear envelope pocket stores small extras and 2 drop-in rear pockets are designed to hold your energy gels. Flat knit elastic waistband with external-tying drawcord. Patagonia Strider Skort features reflective logos to increase your visibility in dim light. 12 in. outer skirt length with 3 in. inseam.
short_description: With built-in liner shorts and feminine styling for your daily run, the Patagonia Strider Skort makes it easy to stick to your workout routine and feel confident doing it.
